attributes.action: Justice for an abused Akita named Kye
attributes.background: Kye was a young Akita rescued by Suzanne and Alistair. His injuries included a fractured skull and numerous bones broken within his structure, bites wounds that covered his body, maggots between his paws and under a majority of he raw flesh, over grown claws causing his feet to become infected.

rejection.details: If you believe you have evidence that a crime has been committed, that would be a matter for the police.
